dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7386 IH: Service Academies District of Columbia Equality Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to increase the number of individuals from the District of Columbia who may be appointed to military service academies.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Service Academies District of Columbia Equality Act.
Section 7442(a)(5) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by striking Five and inserting Fifteen.
Section 8454(a)(5) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by striking Five and inserting Fifteen.
Section 9442(a)(5) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by striking Five and inserting Fifteen.
